chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:
I made a mistake when I purchased this phone and gave the wrong invoice name. Is it possible to change the name afterwards and issue a new invoice in the name of Nicolas Bruns? The address remains the same.
Thank you very much
Thank you for your help,

Hello, 

could you please change the invoice again?

Nicolas Bruns
Matterhornstraße 57
14129 Berlin
Deutschland

Thank you very much.

With best regards,
Kubra, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the invoice, thank you.

Regards,
YR
